options.option_text: This Instructions is just for a reference & not for an evaluation.
It prevents parameters from being changed by the optimizer during theforward pass.
It deallocates the model's parameters from the GPU to save memory.
It disables the creation of the computational graph, saving memory andspeeding up execution.
It ensures that the model operates entirely on the CPU, preventingunnecessary GPU transfers.
